title: Mojito Mocktail
description: Non-alcoholic version of the classic Mojito cocktail, featuring lime, mint, and soda.

title: Green Tea
description: Light and fragrant tea made from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant.

title: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee beverage with your choice of flavors and sweeteners.

title: Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, packed with vitamin C.

title: Coca-Cola
description: Classic carbonated soft drink with a refreshing cola flavor.

title: Italian Sub
description: Layers of ham, salami, pepperoni, provolone cheese, and assorted toppings on a sub roll, drizzled with Italian dressing.

title: Reuben
description: Corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and Russian dressing on rye bread, grilled to perfection.

title: Grilled Cheese
description: Melted cheese sandwiched between buttery, grilled slices of bread.

title: Turkey Club
description: Sliced turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread.

title: Tuna Salad Sandwich
description: Flaked tuna mixed with mayo, celery, and onions served on your choice of bread.

title: Toast with Cheese
description: Crispy bread, melty cheese. Simple & tasty!

title: Toast Ham and Cheese
description: Perfect combo of savory ham and melted cheese on crispy bread. Yum!

title: Vegan Sandwich
description: A vegan sandwich: Fresh veggies, tasty spreads, plant-based protein. Delish & cruelty-free!

title: Chicken Salad Sandwich
description: Tender chicken mixed with creamy dressing, crunchy veggies, served between two slices of bread. Delicious!
